scene_end_anchor: Artie defeated a Level 1 Slime using a Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit, resulting in the destruction of a Patch-Note Oak and the creation of a fifty-foot furrow. He reached Level 2 and received a +1 Dexterity pity bonus. The Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit ability entered a 24-hour cooldown.
constraints: Artie has 1 HP and 1 MP; any damage taken is lethal due to rounding rules.
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Broken Tutorial Sword (carried, container=hand_right)
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Single Copper Coin (stowed, container=pockets)
Timeline Lock: Artie must not reach Oakhaven gates in this scene
Fizz must react with professional concern to the trophy's hidden stats
must include [System Notification] for the Participation Trophy item
next_action: Artie receives a 'Participation Trophy' that attracts monsters, forcing a retreat.

last_scene: Artie engaged a Level 1 Slime in the Whispering Woods, missing five times due to his low Dexterity.
He triggered a Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit that vaporized the slime and a nearby Patch-Note Oak.
The encounter concluded with Artie leveling up to Level 2 and gaining a pity bonus to his Dexterity.
chapter_so_far: Artie has died on Earth and entered the System's character creation void after a vending machine accident.
Artie met his guide, Fizz, and reviewed the details of his death.
Artie exploited the character creation system to create a high-variance 'Crit-Only' build.
Artie entered the Whispering Woods and engaged in his first combat encounter.
Artie discovered that the System's rounding mechanics make his 1 HP build extremely fragile.
Artie survived his first combat encounter by accidentally nuking the tutorial zone.
Artie discovered that his crits can overwrite System rules and destroy world objects.
key_facts_ring: Artie manifested in the Whispering Woods and confirmed his [1/1 HP] status.
Fizz explained the System's rounding rule where 0.1 damage becomes 1 damage.
A Level 1 Tutorial Slime attacked Artie with lunges and a ranged projectile.
Artie was cornered against a Patch-Note Oak that screams error messages when damaged.
The System issued a warning about the slime's Heavy Attack and Artie's near-zero survival probability.
Artie initiated a counter-attack with his Broken Tutorial Sword, triggering a guaranteed Critical Hit.
The slime's mass made contact with Artie's tunic as the strike landed.

location: The Whispering Woods
Artie is currently in physical contact with a Level 1 Slime.
The Whispering Woods are mechanically hostile and recite patch notes.
Artie missed the Level 1 Slime 5 times due to his 1 Dexterity stat.
The slime charged a Heavy Attack that threatened to dissolve Artie.
Artie landed a Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit on the slime's core, deleting the creature.
The resulting blast destroyed a Patch-Note Oak and carved a fifty-foot furrow into the earth.
Artie reached Level 2.
Artie's Luck increased to 104 and he received a +1 Dexterity 'Pity Bonus'.
The Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit ability entered a 24-hour cooldown.
